name: Quick Connect Helper
description: Adds a convenient Quick Connect button to the web interface for easy device pairing with one-click code generation.
overview: Quick Connect Helper adds a dedicated button to Jellyfin's navigation bar, allowing users to instantly generate Quick Connect codes without navigating through settings. Perfect for quickly pairing new devices with your Jellyfin server.

versions.changelog: Initial release with Quick Connect button, gives admins a easy popup to perform Quick Connect on behalf of other users, Tested working on JF 10.10.7 on Fedora Server 42 & on JF 10.11 on Docker.
